Present Position

The Present Position(132) indicates present Position. For more details, see the [Goal Position(116)].

NOTE : Present Position(132) represents 4 byte continuous range from -2,147,483,648 to 2,147,483,647 when Torque is turned off regardless of Operating Mode(11).
However, Present Position(132) will be reset to an absolute position value within one full rotation in following cases:

  1. When Operating Mode(11) switches to Position Control Mode, Present Position(132) will be reset to an absolute position value within a full rotation.
  2. When torque is turned on in Position Control Mode, Present Position(132) will be reset to an absolute position value within one full rotation.
  3. Turning on the power supply or using Reboot Instruction.

Notice that Present Position(132) value can be affected by Homing Offset(20) .
